channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- WP Editor
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- WP Editor

item.title: CVE-2021-24151|2024-08-03T19:21:18.214Z -- unknown -- wp%20editor
item.description: The WP Editor WordPress plugin before 1.2.7 did not sanitise or validate its setting fields leading to an authenticated (admin+) blind SQL injection issue via an arbitrary parameter when making a request to save the settings.
